## start response ##

-- rendered.yaml --
# returned composite status
apiVersion: example.com/v1
kind: XS3Bucket
metadata:
  name: bucket-36f7e
status:
  conditions:
  - lastTransitionTime: "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"
    reason: Available
    status: "True"
    type: Ready
  foo: bar
---
# desired object: my-bucket
apiVersion: s3.aws.upbound.io/v1beta1
kind: Bucket
metadata:
  annotations:
    crossplane.io/composition-resource-name: my-bucket
  generateName: bucket-36f7e-
  labels:
    crossplane.io/composite: bucket-36f7e
  name: bucket-36f7e-bucket
  ownerReferences:
  - apiVersion: example.com/v1
    blockOwnerDeletion: true
    controller: true
    kind: XS3Bucket
    name: bucket-36f7e
    uid: ""
spec:
  forProvider:
    region: eu-west-1
---
# context
apiVersion: render.crossplane.io/v1beta1
fields:
  my-key:
    foo:
      bar: 10
kind: Context
metadata:
  name: context
---
# result
apiVersion: render.crossplane.io/v1beta1
kind: Result
message: hello world
metadata:
  name: result-0
severity: SEVERITY_NORMAL
step: run hcl composition

-- requirements.yaml --
extraResources:
  labels-config:
    apiVersion: apiextensions.crossplane.io/v1beta1
    kind: EnvironmentConfig
    matchLabels:
      labels:
        foo: bar

## end response ##
